# Strapi Documentation v3

## User Docs
- [Configuring views of a content type - Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/content-manager/configuring-view-of-content-type): Instructions to configure the edit view and list view of a content type in a Strapi application.
- [Content Manager - Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/content-manager/introduction-to-content-manager): Introduction to the Content Manager which allows to write content for collection types and single types.
- [Managing Relational Fields - Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/content-manager/managing-relational-fields): Instructions to manage relation-type fields, called "relational fields", which establish a relation between two content-types.
- [Saving & Publishishing content - Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/content-manager/saving-and-publishing-content): Instructions to manage content throughout its whole lifecycle, from the draft version to the deletion of the obsolete content.
- [Translating content - Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/content-manager/translating-content): Instructions to translate content in various locales with i18n plugin
- [Writing Content - Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/content-manager/writing-content): Instructions to write content by filling up fields that are meant to contain specific content (e.g. text, numbers, media etc.).
- [Fields for Content Types - Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/content-types-builder/configuring-fields-content-type): Instructions to configure in the Content-Types Builder the fields that compose each content-type.
- [Creating Content-Types - Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/content-types-builder/creating-new-content-type): The Content-Types Builder allows to create new content-types (single and collection types).
- [Content-Types Builder - Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/content-types-builder/introduction-to-content-types-builder): From the Content-Types Builder, administrators can create and manage content-types (collection types and single types but also components).
- [Managing Content-types - Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/content-types-builder/managing-content-types): The Content-Types Builder allows to manage any existing content-type or component, even if it is already being used in the Content Manager. They can only be…
- [Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/getting-started/introduction): This user guide contains the functional documentation related to all features available in the admin panel of your Strapi application.
- [Installing plugins via the Marketplace - Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/plugins/installing-plugins-via-marketplace): Instructions to install new plugins in a Strapi application via the Marketplace
- [Plugins - Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/plugins/introduction-to-plugins): Reference guide to all Strapi plugins and instructions to use these plugins.
- [List of Strapi plugins - Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/plugins/strapi-plugins): Reference guide to Strapi plugins explaining how they work and how they expand a Strapi application
- [Users & Permissions plugin settings - Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/settings/configuring-users-permissions-plugin-settings): Instructions to configure the Users & Permissions plugin
- [Global Settings - Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/settings/managing-global-settings): Instructions to manage the global settings of a Strapi application in the admin panel.
- [Configure Administrator Roles - Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/users-roles-permissions/configuring-administrator-roles): Instructions to configure the administrator roles of a Strapi application with the Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) feature.
- [Configure End-users Roles - Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/users-roles-permissions/configuring-end-users-roles): Instructions to configure the end-users roles for a front-end application using the Users & Permissions plugin
- [Users, Roles & Permissions - Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/users-roles-permissions/introduction-to-users-roles-permissions): Introduction to the system of permissions of Strapi which gives access to features of the admin panel.
- [Managing Administrators - Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/users-roles-permissions/managing-administrators): Instructions to manage the administrators of a Strapi application with the Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) feature.
- [Managing End-Users Accounts - Strapi User Guide](//user-docs/latest/users-roles-permissions/managing-end-users): Instructions to manage the end-users of a front-end application with the Users & Permissions plugin

## Developer Docs
- [Draft and publish - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/concepts/draft-and-publish): The draft and publish feature allows you to save your content as a draft, to publish it later.
- [CLI - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/cli/CLI): Strapi comes with a full featured Command Line Interface (CLI) which lets you scaffold and manage your project in seconds.
- [Content API - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/content-api): Interact with your Content-Types using the REST API endpoints Strapi generates for you.
- [Integrations - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/integrations): Integrate Strapi with a multitude of frameworks, frontend or backend programming languages.
- [Get started with 11ty - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/integrations/11ty): Build powerful applications using Strapi, the leading open-source headless CMS and 11ty.
- [Get started with Angular - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/integrations/angular): Build powerful applications using Strapi, the leading open-source headless cms and Angular.
- [Get started with Dart - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/integrations/dart): Build powerful applications using Strapi, the leading open-source headless cms and Dart.
- [Get started with Flutter - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/integrations/flutter): Build powerful applications using Strapi, the leading open-source headless cms and Flutter.
- [Get started with Gatsby - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/integrations/gatsby): Build powerful applications using Strapi, the leading open-source headless cms and Gatsby.
- [Get started with Go - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/integrations/go): Build powerful applications using Strapi, the leading open-source headless cms and Go.
- [Get started with GraphQL - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/integrations/graphql): Build powerful applications using Strapi, the leading open-source headless cms and GraphQL.
- [Get started with Gridsome - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/integrations/gridsome): Build powerful applications using Strapi, the leading open-source headless cms and Gridsome.
- [Get started with Jekyll - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/integrations/jekyll): Build powerful applications using Strapi, the leading open-source headless cms and Jekyll.
- [Get started with Laravel - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/integrations/laravel): Build powerful applications using Strapi, the leading open-source headless cms and Laravel.
- [Get started with Next.js - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/integrations/next-js): Build powerful applications using Strapi, the leading open-source headless cms and Next.js.
- [Get started with Nuxt.js - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/integrations/nuxt-js): Build powerful applications using Strapi, the leading open-source headless cms and Nuxt.js.
- [Get started with PHP - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/integrations/php): Build powerful applications using Strapi, the leading open-source headless cms and PHP.
- [Get started with Python - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/integrations/python): Build powerful applications using Strapi, the leading open-source headless cms and Python.
- [Get started with React - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/integrations/react): Build powerful applications using Strapi, the leading open-source headless cms and React.
- [Get started with Ruby - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/integrations/ruby): Build powerful applications using Strapi, the leading open-source headless cms and Ruby.
- [Get started with Sapper - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/integrations/sapper): Build powerful applications using Strapi, the leading open-source headless cms and Sapper.
- [Get started with Svelte - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/integrations/svelte): Build powerful applications using Strapi, the leading open-source headless cms and Svelte.
- [Get started with Vue.js - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/content-api/integrations/vue-js): Build powerful applications using Strapi, the leading open-source headless cms and Vue.js.
- [API Reference - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/developer-resources/global-strapi/api-reference): Discover our concise reference documentation containing all the information to work with your Strapi API
- [Admin panel customization - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/development/admin-customization): The administration panel of Strapi can be customized according to your needs, so you can make it reflect your identity.
- [Backend customization - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/development/backend-customization): The backend of Strapi can be customized according to your needs, so you can create your own backend behavior.
- [Local plugins - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/development/local-plugins-customization): Strapi allows you to create your own custom local plugins that will work exactly the same as external ones.
- [Strapi plugins - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/development/plugin-customization): In Strapi you can install plugins in your node_modules. This allows for easy updates and respect best practices.
- [API Documentation - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/development/plugins/documentation): By using Swagger UI, the API documentation plugin takes out most of your pain to generate your documentation.
- [Email - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/development/plugins/email): Send email from your server or externals providers.
- [GraphQL - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/development/plugins/graphql): Use a GraphQL endpoint in your Strapi project to fetch and mutate your content.
- [Internationalization (i18n) - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/development/plugins/i18n): Instructions on how to use Strapi Content API with the Internationalization (i18n) optional plugin
- [Upload - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/development/plugins/upload): Upload any kind of file on your server or external providers.
- [Roles & Permissions - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/development/plugins/users-permissions): Protect your API with a full authentication process based on JWT and manage the permissions between the groups of users.
- [Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/getting-started/introduction): This documentation contains all technical documentation related to the setup, deployment, update and customization of your Strapi application.
- [Quick Start Guide - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/getting-started/quick-start): Get ready to get Strapi, your favorite open-source headless cms up and running in less than 3 minutes.
- [Troubleshooting - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/getting-started/troubleshooting): Find some answers and solutions to most common issues that you may experience when working with Strapi.
- [Usage information - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/getting-started/usage-information): We are committed to providing a solution, with Strapi, that exceeds the expectations of the users and community. We are also committed to continuing to develop…
- [API Tokens - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/guides/api-token): Learn in this guide how to create an API token system in your Strapi project to execute request as an authenticated user.
- [Authenticated request - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/guides/auth-request): Learn in this guide how you can request the API of your Strapi project as an authenticated user.
- [Client - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/guides/client): Learn in this guide how to setup a connection with a third party client and use it everywhere in your code.
- [Count with GraphQL - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/guides/count-graphql): Learn in this guide how to count data with a GraphQL query.
- [Custom Admin - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/guides/custom-admin): Learn in this guide how you can customize the admin panel of your Strapi project.
- [Custom Data Response - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/guides/custom-data-response): Learn in this guide how you can customize your Strapi project API's response.
- [Draft System - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/guides/draft): Learn in this guide how to create a draft system that will allow you to manage draft, published, and archive status inside your Strapi project.
- [Error Catching - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/guides/error-catching): Learn in this guide how you can catch errors and send them to the Application Monitoring / Error Tracking Software you want.
- [External Data - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/guides/external-data): Learn in this guide how to fetch data from an external service to use it in your Strapi project.
- [Is Owner - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/guides/is-owner): Learn in this guide how to restrict content editing to content authors only.
- [JWT validation - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/guides/jwt-validation): Learn in this guide how to validate a JWT (JSON Web Token) with a third party service.
- [Process Manager - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/guides/process-manager): Learn in this guide how you can start a Strapi application using a process manager.
- [Field Registering - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/guides/registering-a-field-in-admin): Learn in this guide how you can create a new Field for your administration panel.
- [Scheduled Publication - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/guides/scheduled-publication): Learn in this guide how to create an article schedule system.
- [Secure your application - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/guides/secure-your-app): Learn in this guide how you can secure your Strapi application by using a third party provider.
- [Send Email - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/guides/send-email): Learn in this guide how to use the Email plugin to send email where you want in your Strapi app.
- [Slug System - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/guides/slug): Learn in this guide how to create a slug system for a Post, Article or any Content Type you want in your Strapi project.
- [Unit Testing - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/guides/unit-testing): Learn in this guide how you can run basic unit tests for a Strapi application using a testing framework.
- [Configurations - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/configurations): Learn how you can manage and customize the configuration of your Strapi application.
- [MongoDB - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/configurations/databases/mongodb): Learn how to install MongoDB on your computer and using it for your Strapi application.
- [SQLite - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/configurations/databases/sqlite): Learn how you can use SQLite for your Strapi application.
- [Deployment - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/deployment): Learn how to develop locally with Strapi and deploy Strapi with various hosting options.
- [21YunBox Deployment - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/deployment/hosting-guides/21yunbox): Learn in this guide how to update an existing Strapi project so it can be deployed on 21YunBox.
- [AWS Deployment - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/deployment/hosting-guides/amazon-aws): Learn in this guide how to deploy your Strapi application on AWS EC2, host your database on AWS RDS and upload your assets on AWS S3.
- [Azure Deployment - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/deployment/hosting-guides/azure): Learn in this guide how to deploy your Strapi application on Microsoft Azure.
- [DigitalOcean Droplet Deployment - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/deployment/hosting-guides/digitalocean): Learn in this guide how to deploy your Strapi application on DigitalOcean Droplets.
- [DigitalOcean App Platform Deployment - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/deployment/hosting-guides/digitalocean-app-platform): Learn in this guide how to deploy your Strapi application on DigitalOcean App Platform.
- [Google App Engine Deployment - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/deployment/hosting-guides/google-app-engine): Learn in this guide how to deploy your Strapi application on Google App Engine and how to upload your assets on Google Cloud Storage.
- [Heroku Deployment - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/deployment/hosting-guides/heroku): Learn in this guide how to deploy your Strapi application on Heroku.
- [Qovery Deployment - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/deployment/hosting-guides/qovery): Learn in this guide how to deploy your Strapi application on Qovery.
- [Render Deployment - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/deployment/hosting-guides/render): Learn in this guide how to deploy your Strapi application on Render.
- [Caddy Proxying - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/deployment/optional-software/caddy-proxy): Learn how you can use a proxy application like Caddy to secure your Strapi application.
- [HAProxy Proxying - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/deployment/optional-software/haproxy-proxy): Learn how you can use a proxy application like HAProxy to secure your Strapi application.
- [Nginx Proxying - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/deployment/optional-software/nginx-proxy): Learn how you can use a proxy application like Nginx to secure your Strapi application.
- [Project Structure - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/file-structure): Discover the project structure of any default Strapi application.
- [Installation - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/installation): Learn many different options to install Strapi and getting started on using it.
- [Installing from CLI - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/installation/cli): Fast-track local install for getting Strapi running on your computer in less than a minute.
- [DigitalOcean Virtual Machine Configuration](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/installation/digitalocean-customization): # DigitalOcean Virtual Machine Configuration
- [DigitalOcean One-click - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/installation/digitalocean-one-click): Quickly deploy a Strapi application on DigitalOcean by simply using their One-click button.
- [Install from Docker - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/installation/docker): Quickly create a Strapi application using our official Strapi Docker images.
- [Install using Platform.sh - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/installation/platformsh): Quickly deploy a Strapi application using the official Platform.sh Strapi template.
- [Render One-Click - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/installation/render): Quickly deploy a Strapi application on Render by simply using their One-click button.
- [Templates - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/setup-deployment-guides/installation/templates): Quickly create a pre-made Strapi application designed for a specific use case. It allows you to quickly bootstrap a custom Strapi app.
- [Migrate Guides - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides): All the migration guides for a Strapi application.
- [Migrate from v1 to v3 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-1-to-3): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from v1 to v3.
- [Migrate from 3.0.x to 3.1.x - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-3.0.x-to-3.1.x): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from 3.0.x to 3.1.x.
- [Migrate from 3.1.x to 3.2.3 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-3.1.x-to-3.2.x): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from 3.1.x to 3.2.3.
- [Migrate from 3.2.3 to 3.2.4 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-3.2.3-to-3.2.4): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from 3.2.3 to 3.2.4.
- [Migrate from 3.2.5 to 3.3.0 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-3.2.5-to-3.3.0): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from 3.2.5 to 3.3.0.
- [Migrate from 3.3.x to 3.4.0 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-3.3.x-to-3.4.0): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from 3.3.x to 3.4.0.
- [Migrate from 3.4.x to 3.4.4 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-3.4.x-to-3.4.4): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from 3.4.x to 3.4.4.
- [Migrate from alpha.10 to alpha.11 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.10-to-alpha.11): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.10 to alpha.11.
- [Migrate from alpha.11 to alpha.12 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.11-to-alpha.12): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.11 to alpha.12.
- [Migrate from alpha.12.1 to alpha.12.2 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.12.1-to-alpha.12.2): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.12.1 to alpha.12.2.
- [Migrate from alpha.12.2 to alpha.12.3 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.12.2-to-alpha.12.3): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.12.2 to alpha.12.3.
- [Migrate from alpha.12.3 to alpha.12.4 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.12.3-to-alpha.12.4): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.12.3 to alpha.12.4.
- [Migrate from alpha.12.4 to alpha.12.5 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.12.4-to-alpha.12.5): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.12.4 to alpha.12.5.
- [Migrate from alpha.12.5 to alpha.12.6 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.12.5-to-alpha.12.6): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.12.5 to alpha.12.6.
- [Migrate from alpha.12.6 to alpha.12.7 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.12.6-to-alpha.12.7): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.12.6 to alpha.12.7.
- [Migrate from alpha.12.7 to alpha.13 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.12.7-to-alpha.13): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.12.7 to alpha.13.
- [Migrate from alpha.13 to alpha.13.1 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.13-to-alpha.13.1): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.13 to alpha.13.1.
- [Migrate from alpha.13.1 to alpha.14 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.13.1-to-alpha.14): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.13.1 to alpha.14.
- [Migrate from alpha.14 to alpha.14.1 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.14-to-alpha.14.1): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.14 to alpha.14.1.
- [Migrate from alpha.14.1 to alpha.14.2 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.14.1-to-alpha.14.2): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.14.1 to alpha.14.2.
- [Migrate from alpha.14.2 to alpha.14.3 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.14.2-to-alpha.14.3): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.14.2 to alpha.14.3.
- [Migrate from alpha.14.3 to alpha.14.4 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.14.3-to-alpha.14.4): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.14.3 to alpha.14.4.
- [Migrate from alpha.14.4 to alpha.14.5 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.14.4-to-alpha.14.5): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.14.4 to alpha.14.5.
- [Migrate from alpha.14.5 to alpha.15 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.14.5-to-alpha.15): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.14.5 to alpha.15.
- [Migrate from alpha.15 to alpha.16 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.15-to-alpha.16): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.15 to alpha.16.
- [Migrate from alpha.16 to alpha.17 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.16-to-alpha.17): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.16 to alpha.17.
- [Migrate from alpha.17 to alpha.18 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.17-to-alpha.18): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.17 to alpha.18.
- [Migrate from alpha.18 to alpha.19 - Strapi Developer Documentation](//developer-docs/latest/update-migration-guides/migration-guides/migration-guide-alpha.18-to-alpha.19): Learn how you can migrate your Strapi application from alpha.18 to alpha.19.
